name: Edgedive
long_description:
Edgedive is your AI support engineer - embedded in your existing stack (Intercom, Linear, Slack, GitHub, etc.). It: 

- Prioritizes customer issues and requests by impact (frequency, ACV, and severity).
- Auto-investigates issues end-to-end: root cause, impact assessment, plan to fix.
- Opens merge-ready PRs that build cleanly and follow your teamâ€™s standards.

Imagine having an always-on teammate who continuously triages customer pain, plans fixes, and pushes code changes so you can start your morning with fresh, mergeable PRs, ready for review.
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate
